University Calendar












Featured





Reuse Culture Expo


Monday, May 1, 2023 - 4:00pm to 6:00pm 


 

Reuse Culture Expo is an event hosted by AS sustainability as part of initiatives to cultivate a zero-waste and reuse lifestyle among CSUN students and staff. Read more 











AS Senate Meeting


Monday, May 1, 2023 - 9:00am to 11:00am 


 

Sit in on the weekly AS Senate Meeting. Or take the mic during open forum and address the senators with your concerns, questions and comments.To find out what's on the agenda, visit our agenda and minutes page. Read more 





Reuse Culture Expo


Monday, May 1, 2023 - 4:00pm to 6:00pm 


 

Reuse Culture Expo is an event hosted by AS sustainability as part of initiatives to cultivate a zero-waste and reuse lifestyle among CSUN students and staff. Read more 





Farmers Market: APIA History


Tuesday, May 2, 2023 - 10:00am to 2:00pm 


 

Come out and enjoy our annual AS Farmers Market. This week's celebration: APIA History Read more 





VRC: The Blend


Wednesday, May 3, 2023 - 10:00am to 12:00pm 


 

Perk up with coffee and snacks while learning about the resources available to you at The Blend! Presented by the Veterans Resource Center of the University Student Union. Read more






Fallen Matador Memorial


Wednesday, May 3, 2023 - 10:00am to 4:00pm 


 

Stop by & honor all those from the Matador Community we have lost. Roses will be provided while supplies last. Read more 





CSUN Alumni Attorney Networking Group May Meeting


Wednesday, May 3, 2023 - 5:00pm to 6:30pm 


 

 Join the CSUN Alumni Attorney Networking Group's May meeting via Zoom and connect with fellow Matador attorneys.  Read more






HOME: A Multimedia Project on Climate Change


Thursday, May 4, 2023 - 2:00pm to 3:30pm 


 

Two Performances: Thursday May 4, 2023 at 7:30pm and Friday May 5, 2023 at 2pm. CSUN showcases a new multimedia performance that addresses climate change and the anxiety related to this environmental crisis. This new work includes students and faculty from three different colleges (Mike Curb College of Arts, Media, and Communication (event hosts), College of Health and Human Development, and College of Social and Behavioral Sciences) and five different departments (Africana Studies, Environmental and Occupational Health, Kinesiology, Music, and Theatre). Find Out More About This Event and Register






Outdoor Adventures: White Water Rafting


Friday, May 5, 2023 - 12:00am to Sunday, May 7, 2023 - 12:00pm 


 

Have you dreamt about soaring through rapids? Well, now it is your chance to be able to spend a day out White Water Rafting through beautiful rapids. Read more 





Outdoor Adventures: Intro to Surfing


Friday, May 5, 2023 - 12:00am to 12:00pm 


 

When in California, do as the... Californians do! It is a common myth that we surf to classes, so do your part in perpetuating awesome stereotypes and catch some swells out in the Pacific Ocean. Read more 





QPR Suicide Prevention Training for Faculty & Staff


Friday, May 5, 2023 - 9:00am to 10:30am 


 

Join this 90-minute training and learn how to make a positive difference in the life of someone in need.  Read more
